references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational framework for score-based generative models, which is closely related to the variational flow matching approach discussed in the main paper.
This paper introduces flow matching, which is the main method that the current paper builds upon and improves.
This paper is a seminal work in the field of normalizing flows, which is closely related to the topic of the main paper.
This paper introduces neural ordinary differential equations (NODEs), a key technique used in continuous normalizing flows, which are relevant to the current paper.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a highly influential approach in generative modeling that shares some conceptual similarities with the current paper's method.
